meanings.definition: A decorative illustration facing the title page of a book.
meanings.sent1: The frontispieces in classic novels often depict important scenes from the story.
meanings.sent2: I always admire the intricate frontispieces in old books.
meanings.sent3: The frontispieces in children's books can spark imagination and wonder.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library with frontispieces of memories lining the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The frontispieces of the books seemed to come alive with vibrant colors and detailed artwork.

meanings.definition: A decorative panel above the grill of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The shiny frontispieces on the cars added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: Car enthusiasts often customize their vehicles with unique frontispieces.
meanings.sent3: The frontispieces on the vintage cars gleamed under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The frontispieces of the cars resembled small pieces of art on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The frontispieces of the vehicles reflected the surrounding scenery like mirrors.

meanings.definition: A facade or front of a building.
meanings.sent1: The grand frontispieces of the mansion impressed all who passed by.
meanings.sent2: Architects pay special attention to designing unique frontispieces for buildings.
meanings.sent3: The frontispieces of the buildings in the city created a stunning skyline.
meanings.sent4: The frontispieces of the buildings stood tall, welcoming visitors with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The frontispieces of the structures told stories of the city's history and culture.
